response.message:
There are some more details on what's still TODO that we know of over on Stack Apps:

http://stackapps.com/questions/2830/api-v2-0-public-beta-begins

This is very much a proper beta (not a Google Beta™), I'm expecting some bugs to still be lingering around.

Good luck everyone!

I really think that now (with v2.0 available) it is extremely important that this question gets answered:

http://stackapps.com/questions/2619/how-to-find-libraries-that-are-compatible-with-a-certain-api-release-on-stack-ap

After all, if someone wants to write an app and use an existing library, how will they know (at a glance) what their options are?
Its not for every child under the age of 13 :P (Me)
I'm going to win that iPad!
You doesn't - i am will winner!
Ahem.... Cant wait for the winners list !!! :P
